promises.title: To My Dearest {Kittu}
promises.text: I don’t know where life will take us, but I wanted to make a promise to you right now…...

promises.title: My First Vow
promises.text: I promise to stand by you in every situation. No matter how tough life gets, you will never have to face it alone.

promises.title: My Happiness
promises.text: I promise to try everything for your happiness. Seeing you smile is my biggest achievement, and I want to be the reason for it.

promises.title: My Commitment
promises.text: I promise to work on myself every single day. I want to be a better man, a better partner you truly deserve.

promises.title: Forever Yours
promises.text:
. I can't wait to call you nahi Malum. Happy Promise Day! 
- Someone  who cares
